tidbits.title: Mesopotamian Civilization
tidbits.description: Iraq is home to ancient Mesopotamia, considered the cradle of civilization, where writing, agriculture, and early cities emerged.

tidbits.title: Rich Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: The country has a rich cultural heritage with historic sites like Babylon, showcasing architectural marvels and ancient historical records.

tidbits.title: Diverse Landscapes
tidbits.description: Iraq boasts diverse landscapes, from fertile plains by the Tigris and Euphrates rivers to deserts, providing a range of ecosystems.
